How many people are affected by 1p36 deletion syndrome ?,"1p36 deletion syndrome is believed to affect between 1 in 5,000 and 1 in 10,000 newborns. However, this may be an underestimate because some affected individuals are likely never diagnosed.",GHR,1p36 deletion syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to 1p36 deletion syndrome ?,1p36 deletion syndrome is caused by a deletion of genetic material from a specific region in the short (p)
